title: Central Europe alliance signs cardio pact linked to EU Safe Hearts Plan [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Experts from the region urge Brussels to consider Central Europe’s specific needs in the EU cardiovascular strategy to avoid increasing existing health inequalities
summary_public: Experts from the region urge Brussels to consider Central Europe’s specific needs in the EU cardiovascular strategy to avoid increasing existing health inequalities
